nodes.content: 👋 Hello! I'm your ZFlo-powered Telegram bot. How can I help you today?

nodes.title: Thank you!
nodes.content: Thank you for using this bot!

nodes.title: Help Information
nodes.content:
🆘 **Help Menu**

I can help you with:
• Navigation through this flow
• Information about my capabilities
• Answering basic questions

Use the buttons below to interact with me!

nodes.title: About This Bot
nodes.content:
ℹ️ **About Me**

I'm powered by ZFlo flows and running on Telegram! I was created to demonstrate how easy it is to build interactive bots using flowchart definitions.

🔧 **Technology Stack:**
• ZFlo Flow Engine
• Telegram Bot API
• Node.js Runtime

nodes.title: Bot Features
nodes.content:
✨ **My Features**

🤖 **Interactive Conversations**
Navigate through structured flows with buttons

📊 **Multi-Format Support**
Built from JSON, Mermaid, DOT, or PlantUML files

🔄 **Real-time Updates**
Flow can be updated without restarting

🌐 **Flexible Deployment**
Supports both polling and webhook modes
